input_text:
Job Title: Shipper/Packer PPPM - 1st Shift with Security Clearance

Location: Utah, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Purpose and Scope: Performs range of duties in the receipt, stow, and issue of material. Ensures items being stowed or shipped meet requirements of MIL STD 129N. Uses anti-static devices. Receives daily work assignments from Lead position in immediate organizational element. Essential Responsibilities:

Ensures shipments are properly packaged, labeled, loaded into vehicles.Able to use basic processes of inspection/examination procedures for material.Able to read specifications and photographs as/if required in DLA contract.Load material on and off of skids, pallets, stands.Prepare labels as required. Able to prepare basic reports.Operate tools and equipment in performance of duties.Receive data from and input data to DSS and other automated systems in performance of duties.Operate MHE as assigned and hold appropriate license. (Max 10% of time) Count, weigh, record data, apply tags and labels.Able to make preventive maintenance adjustments to related equipment. Minimum Requirements:Must be a United States citizen.Must have a valid driver's license.Must be able to obtain and maintain a Secret Clearance if needed.Must have a minimum of three months general work experience, which will demonstrate the ability to perform requirements of the position.Must be able to obtain license to use Material Handler Equipment within 30 days of selection. Other Responsibilities: SafetyAmentum enforces a safety culture whereby all employees have the responsibility for continuously developing and maintaining a safe work environment. As appropriate, each employee is responsible for completing all training requirements and fulfilling all self-aid/buddy aid responsibilities, participating in emergency response tasks and serving on safety committees and teams. QualityQuality is the foundation for the management of our business and the keystone to our goal of customer satisfaction. It is our policy to consistently provide services that meet customer expectations. Accordingly, each employee must conform to the Amentum Quality Policy and carry out job activities in compliance with applicable Amentum Quality System documents and customer contracts. Each employee must read and understand his/her Quality Management and Customer Satisfaction responsibilities. Procedure ComplianceEach employee must read, understand and implement the general and specific operational, safety, quality and environmental requirements of all plans, procedures and policies pertaining to his/her job. Amentum is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. Our hiring practices provide equal opportunity for employment without regard to race, religion, color, sex, gender, national origin, age, United States military veteran's status, ancestry, sexual orientation, marital status, family structure, medical condition including genetic characteristics or information, veteran status, or mental or physical disability so long as the essential functions of the job can be performed with or without reasonable accommodation, or any other protected category under federal, state, or local law. Labor Law Posters EEO including Disability/Protected Veterans

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Shipper/Packer PPPM - 1st Shift with Security Clearance
output_json.summary: Performs range of duties in the receipt, stow, and issue of material.
job_responsibilities: Ensures shipments are properly packaged, labeled, loaded into vehicles.
Uses basic processes of inspection/examination procedures for material.
Reads specifications and photographs as required in DLA contract.
Loads material on and off of skids, pallets, stands.
Operates tools and equipment in performance of duties.
Receives data from and inputs data to DSS and other automated systems.
Operates Material Handling Equipment (MHE) as assigned.
Counts, weighs, records data, applies tags and labels.
Makes preventive maintenance adjustments to related equipment.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Amentum enforces a safety culture whereby all employees have the responsibility for continuously developing and maintaining a safe work environment.

other.content: Amentum enforces a safety culture whereby all employees have the responsibility for continuously developing and maintaining a safe work environment.
Quality is the foundation for the management of our business and the keystone to our goal of customer satisfaction.
Amentum is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer.
